Title: American Relief Agency - Report on American relief work. 11
Notes: Children in the welfare stations get a monthly medical checkup. A boy with an eye disease is treated in one of the medical stations set up by the Relief Agency. The picture on the right shows a patient in a mental institution receiving work training to make him more useful in life (sic). Many destitute people receive free medical care.Nr. 11 of the poster set on the Economic Aid Agreement between the United States of America and the Republic of China (3 July 1948).
